name: Fourier Match!
description:
Match the incoming red wave from the right with your own green wave from the left!

Controls:

  • Mouse: Green wave height
  • H: Toggle help lines
  • B: Toggle blur
  • R: Randomize palette
  • D: Default palette
  • S: Toggle score lines
  • N: Toggle noise volume
  • M: Toggle game volume

Visual Guide:

  • Red: Incoming wave (right to left)
  • Green: Outgoing wave (left to right)
  • Blue: (Red + Green) wave
  • White: (Red - Green) wave

Goal: Keep the White wave as close to center as possible!
